meanings.definition: A repeated rhythmic phrase or song.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the monks sang ancient chants.
meanings.sent2: The fans started chanting the team's name in unison.
meanings.sent3: The catchy chant got stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic chant of the waves against the shore was soothing.
meanings.sent5: The haunting chant echoed through the empty halls.

meanings.definition: To sing or recite in a monotonous, repetitive tone.
meanings.sent1: The protesters chanted slogans outside the government building.
meanings.sent2: She chants the same prayer every night before bed.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly chants his grocery list to remember it better.
meanings.sent4: The wind chants through the trees on a stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The children chant the alphabet song together in class.
